column2: text
Though we do not like it, we will still feast to it.
This leaves me with a bad taste, nothing a few beef and beer pies can’t sort out though.
Esmerelda forgive us.
You don’t want to be on the wrong end of our Hot Pot.
We do this for the Moot.
You who look down on us, what say you now?
Forgive us Esmerelda, we do it for the Moot.
You think us lessers, we will not bow to you.
No amount of food or tobacco would see us deal with the likes of you.
Not with all the feasts of the world would I accept this.
You are no friend of the Halflings, what do you want?
The sight of you makes me sick, speak quickly so I don’t lose my lunch.
I only speak to you out of respect to Esmerelda.
May Hyacinth bless you, friend.
Let us feast!
Our crops falter, will you help us?
For the good of the Mootland and your lands.
Accept and we will have a hearty feast!
What say you friends of the Moot.
Our pantry is bare, so if we were to accept we could not feast.
Do not despair, come let us feast anyway!
We’re sorry we can’t accept but please take some Gipfel Tobacco, the finest in all the Moot, as a token of good will.
Greetings, friends of the Moot.
We have arranged a feast for your arrival.
Welcome to the Mootland friends.
May Esmerelda bless your travels.
I think a small feast is in order!
This will strengthen the Moots borders.
Thank you, please take some pies and tobacco as a token of our appreciation.
Hyacinth bless you.
The Moot thanks you.
Hyacinth bless you.
Let us feast!
Josias’ curses.
There will be no feast tonight.
The price of our pies and tobacco just doubled for you.
Josias’ curses.
There will be no feast tonight.
The price of our pies and tobacco just doubled for you.
May Taal bring ruin to you and Sigmar strengthen our resolve.
There will be no feast tonight.
You’ll soon find out our Hot Pot is as delicious as it is deadly!
This no longer serves the Moots interests.
We’re sorry, but please take some Gipfel Tobacco, the finest in all the Moot, as a token of our apology.
Josias knows we worked hard to make this work but alas we must cut our losses.
Please will you come the Moots aid in these dark times.
We need your help, we don’t have much in the way of gold but please take all the pies and tobacco you want.
Will you join arms with the small folk?
Blight has ruined our harvest, will you lend us some coin?
Would some pies or tobacco sweeten the deal?
Accept and we will feast!
Will you accept the Moot’s offer?
Not this time, but stay awhile eat and smoke with us.
It is not Esmerelda’s wish.
I hope you understand but this wouldn’t be in the best interest of the Moot.
We may be small but we have heart.
Have you not heard the tales of Glibfoot’s damned?
We are a part of this world, let us fight!
In Rhya’s name, lets have peace.
We’ll admit we have bitten off more than we can chew!
Please we will give you anything gold, pies or tobacco just show us mercy.
We may be small but we have heart.
Have you not heard the tales of Glibfoot’s damned?
We are a part of this world, let us fight!
Now let us feast!
And we’ve thrown in some pies and tobacco too.
Take this friend and may Ryha bless you.
What can the small folk do for you?
How can we help, food, tobacco or something else?
Welcome, I am Glibfoot, how can I be of service?
You looked down on us for too long friend.
You look so little, just how you once saw us.
We could never feast with the likes of you.
The Mootland must remain independent.
This is not Esmerelda’s wish
Not with all the feasts of the world would I accept this.
We bang the pots, the Halflings go to war.
We will feast to your defeat.
You have looked down on us for too long.
